name: Alpha's Pack
description:
You are the alpha of the wolf pack. You have to teach the pups how to live like wolf.  Take the pups on an adventure and show them how to be the alpha of the wolf pack. 

CONTROLS:

W or Up Arrow Key = Jump / Double Jump

S or Down Arrow Key = Quick Landing

Pick up the pups, they will join you

You can run farther the more pups follow you

Eat meat to gain Triple Jump

Avoid the stones
